Messages: All the New Users are Welcomed to the XinFin Family! XinFin Community Channel Rules: 1. All members must have an avatar and an @username handle. 2. No FUD. Please keep your discussions with each other professional and respectful. This means profanity should be kept to a minimum. 3. Price discussions, games, etc are prohibited. You will be warned first, but if the behavior continues you will be restricted and potentially banned. 4. Only XinFin related talk is permitted. 5. Our Telegram Admins will NOT initiate a conversation with you through DMâ€™s (Direct Message) 6. No team member or Admin will ever ask you to send them tokens or money. About XinFin: XinFin is an open source Enterprise Ready Hybrid Blockchain for Global Trade and Finance. It combines the power of Public & Private Blockchains with interoperable smart contracts. For more information on XinFin please visit: www.xinfin.org Video explanation of XinFin: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K-tHZkV6zAs XinFin-XDC & XDCe Utilities are available here: https://www.xinfin.org/xdc-utility.php Contribute & Get Rewarded with Bounty Program: https://xinfin.org/bounty.php Developer Community Resource: https://docs.xinfin.org/docs Video explainer on TradeFinex Usecase: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mjrhTnZ16f8&t=939s Anyone who wishes to promote the utility applications built around XDC can run KYC enforced Masternodes/Full Nodes. Details help file at http://xinfin.network/#masternode Find exchanges that support XinFin (XDC & XDCE) here: https://XinFin.io Follow us on: Twitter: @XinFin_Official LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/xinfin/ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/xinfin/ BitcoinTalk: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1989818.0 YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQaL6FixEQ80RJC0B2egX6g Telegram: https://t.me/xinfin Medium: https://medium.com/xinfin Subscribe to XinFin Community Newsletter: https://medium.us19.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=29674c2726d5f176738d9aa27&id=8880c2ec14 Share this link with your friends and contribute to community growth.
